verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: يَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>صَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>حِبَىِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6658'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سِّ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':6659'>جْ</tajweed>نِ ءَأَرْبَا<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6660'>بٌ م</tajweed>ُّتَفَرِّقُونَ خَيْرٌ أَمِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':717'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6661'>ٱ</tajweed>لْو<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>حِدُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6662'>ٱ</tajweed>لْقَهّ<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>رُ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Yā ṣāḥibayis-sijni a'arbābum mutafarriqūna khairun amillāhul-wāḥidul-qahhār(u).
verses.translation: О мои други по темнице! (Кто) лучше: множество господ, которые разнятся, Или Единый и Неодолимый В Своем могуществе Аллах

verses.text_uthmani: مَا تَعْبُدُونَ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ إِلَّآ أَسْمَآءً سَمَّيْتُمُوهَآ أَنتُمْ وَءَابَآؤُكُم مَّآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ بِهَا مِن سُلْطَـٰنٍ ۚ إِنِ ٱلْحُكْمُ إِلَّا لِلَّهِ ۚ أَمَرَ أَلَّا تَعْبُدُوٓا۟ إِلَّآ إِيَّاهُ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلدِّينُ ٱلْقَيِّمُ وَلَـٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ

Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َاسِ لَا يَعْلَم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Mā ta'budūna min dūnihī illā asmā'an sammaitumūhā antum wa ābā'ukum mā anzalallāhu bihā min sulṭān(in), inil-ḥukmu illā lillāh(i), amara allā ta'budū illā iyyāh(u), żālikad-dīnul-qayyimu wa lākinna akṡaran-nāsi lā ya'lamūn(a).
verses.translation: Коль не Его, Так только имена вы чтите, Что вы придумали и ваши праотцы, - На что Аллах им власти не давал. Решение всему - лишь у Аллаха, И повелел Он поклоняться лишь Ему. Сие есть истинная вера, Но большинство людей (того) не понимает

verses.text_uthmani: يَـٰصَـٰحِبَىِ ٱلسِّجْنِ أَمَّآ أَحَدُكُمَا فَيَسْقِى رَبَّهُۥ خَمْرًا ۖ وَأَمَّا ٱلْـَٔاخَرُ فَيُصْلَبُ فَتَأْكُلُ ٱلطَّيْرُ مِن رَّأْسِهِۦ ۚ قُضِىَ ٱلْأَمْرُ ٱلَّذِى فِيهِ تَسْتَفْتِيَانِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: يَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>صَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>حِبَىِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6658'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سِّ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':6659'>جْ</tajweed>نِ أَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَحَدُكُمَا فَيَسْقِى رَبَّهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> خَمْ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6664'>رًا‌ۖ و</tajweed>َأَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6665'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَخَرُ فَيُصْلَبُ فَتَأْكُلُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6666'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>طَّيْرُ م<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':1057'>ِن ر</tajweed>َّأْسِه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed>‌ۚ قُضِىَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6667'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَمْرُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6668'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِى فِيهِ تَسْتَفْتِي<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>نِ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Yā ṣāḥibayis-sijni ammā aḥadukumā fa yasqī rabbahū khamrā(n), wa ammal-ākharu fa yuṣlabu fa ta'kuluṭ-ṭairu mir ra'sih(ī), quḍiyal-amrul-lażī fīhi tastaftiyān(i).
verses.translation: О мои други по темнице! Один из вас будет поить правителя вином, Другому же - распятым быть, И птицам - с головы его клевать. Уже решилось то, о чем вы спрос ведете

verses.text_uthmani: وَقَالَ لِلَّذِى ظَنَّ أَنَّهُۥ نَاجٍ مِّنْهُمَا ٱذْكُرْنِى عِندَ رَبِّكَ فَأَنسَىٰهُ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ ذِكْرَ رَبِّهِۦ فَلَبِثَ فِى ٱلسِّجْنِ بِضْعَ سِنِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَقَالَ لِلَّذِى ظَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ أَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> نَا<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6669'>جٍ م</tajweed>ِّنْهُمَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6670'>ٱ</tajweed>ذْكُرْنِى عِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':264'>ند</tajweed>َ رَبِّكَ فَأَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':6671'>نس</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>هُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6672'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>شَّيْطَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>نُ ذِكْرَ رَبِّه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed> فَلَبِثَ فِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6673'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سِّ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':6659'>جْ</tajweed>نِ بِضْعَ سِن<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa qāla lil-lażī ẓanna annahū nājim minhumażkurnī 'inda rabbik(a), fa ansāhusy-syaiṭānu żikra rabbihī fa labiṡa fis-sijni biḍ'a sinīn(a).
verses.translation: И он сказал тому из них, Которого считал спасенным: "Ты обо мне правителю напомни". Но Сатана заставил (узника) забыть Правителю напомнить о Йусуфе, И несколько (тяжелых) лет Ему пришлось пробыть в темнице

verses.text_uthmani: وَقَالَ ٱلْمَلِكُ إِنِّىٓ أَرَىٰ سَبْعَ بَقَرَٰتٍ سِمَانٍ يَأْكُلُهُنَّ سَبْعٌ عِجَافٌ وَسَبْعَ سُنۢبُلَـٰتٍ خُضْرٍ وَأُخَرَ يَابِسَـٰتٍ ۖ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْمَلَأُ أَفْتُونِى فِى رُءْيَـٰىَ إِن كُنتُمْ لِلرُّءْيَا تَعْبُرُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَقَالَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6674'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمَلِكُ إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِىٓ</tajweed> أَرَىٰ سَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':158'>بْ</tajweed>عَ بَقَر<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed><tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':6675'>تٍ س</tajweed>ِمَا<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6676'>نٍ ي</tajweed>َأْكُلُهُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ سَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':6677'>بْ</tajweed>عٌ عِجَا<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6678'>فٌ و</tajweed>َسَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':6679'>بْ</tajweed>عَ سُ<tajweed class='iqlb' data-type='iqlab' data-description='Iqlab' data-tajweed=':6680'>نۢب</tajweed>ُلَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>تٍ خُضْ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6681'>رٍ و</tajweed>َأُخَرَ يَابِسَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed><tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6682'>تٍ‌ۖ ي</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ـٰٓ</tajweed>أَيُّهَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6683'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمَلَأُ أَفْتُونِى فِى رُءْيَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>ىَ إِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':109'>ن ك</tajweed>ُ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':100'>نت</tajweed>ُمْ لِلرُّءْيَا تَعْبُر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa qālal-maliku innī arā sab'a baqarātin simāniy ya'kuluhunna sab'un 'ijāfuw wa sab'a sumbulātin khuḍriw wa ukhara yābisāt(in), yā ayyuhal-mala'u aftūnī fī ru'yāya in kuntum lir-ru'yā ta'burūn(a).
verses.translation: И царь сказал: "Поистине, (во сне) я видел семь упитанных коров, Которых семь худых коров съедают, А также семь зеленых колосков И семь других - пожатых. О родовая знать (двора)! Вы (сно)видение мое мне растолкуйте, Коль вы видения способны толковать

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوٓا۟ أَضْغَـٰثُ أَحْلَـٰمٍ ۖ وَمَا نَحْنُ بِتَأْوِيلِ ٱلْأَحْلَـٰمِ بِعَـٰلِمِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَال<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ُوٓ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> أَضْغَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>ثُ أَحْلَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed><tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6684'>مٍ‌ۖ و</tajweed>َمَا نَحْنُ بِتَأْوِيلِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6685'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَحْلَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>مِ بِعَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>لِم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qālū aḍgāṡu aḥlām(in), wa mā naḥnu bita'wīlil-aḥlāmi bi'ālimīn(a).
verses.translation: Они ответили: "Сие - смешение (пустых) видений. Мы не владеем даром толкованья снов

verses.text_uthmani: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِى نَجَا مِنْهُمَا وَٱدَّكَرَ بَعْدَ أُمَّةٍ أَنَا۠ أُنَبِّئُكُم بِتَأْوِيلِهِۦ فَأَرْسِلُونِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَقَالَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6593'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِى نَجَا مِنْهُمَا وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6686'>ٱ</tajweed>دَّكَرَ بَعْدَ أُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َةٍ أَنَا۟ أُنَبِّئُك<tajweed class='ikhf_shfw' data-type='ikhafa-shafawi' data-description='Ikhafa' Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':6687'>ُم ب</tajweed>ِتَأْوِيلِه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed> فَأَرْسِل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نِ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa qālal-lażī najā minhumā waddakara  ba'da ummatin ana unabbi'ukum bita'wīlihī fa arsilūn(i).
verses.translation: Но (узник) тот из двух, что был освобожден, Спустя (столь долгий) срок Вдруг вспомнил о Йусуфе И молвил им: "Я сообщу вам толкование сего. Меня (к Йусуфу) отведите

verses.text_uthmani: يُوسُفُ أَيُّهَا ٱلصِّدِّيقُ أَفْتِنَا فِى سَبْعِ بَقَرَٰتٍ سِمَانٍ يَأْكُلُهُنَّ سَبْعٌ عِجَافٌ وَسَبْعِ سُنۢبُلَـٰتٍ خُضْرٍ وَأُخَرَ يَابِسَـٰتٍ لَّعَلِّىٓ أَرْجِعُ إِلَى ٱلنَّاسِ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: يُوسُفُ أَيُّهَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6688'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>صِّدِّيقُ أَفْتِنَا فِى سَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':6689'>بْ</tajweed>عِ بَقَر<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed><tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':6675'>تٍ س</tajweed>ِمَا<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6676'>نٍ ي</tajweed>َأْكُلُهُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ سَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':6677'>بْ</tajweed>عٌ عِجَا<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6690'>فٌ و</tajweed>َسَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':6691'>بْ</tajweed>عِ سُ<tajweed class='iqlb' data-type='iqlab' data-description='Iqlab' data-tajweed=':6680'>نۢب</tajweed>ُلَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>تٍ خُضْ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6681'>رٍ و</tajweed>َأُخَرَ يَابِسَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed><tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6692'>تٍ ل</tajweed>َّعَلّ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِىٓ</tajweed> أَرْجِعُ إِلَى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':5455'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed><tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َاسِ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَعْلَم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Yūsufu ayyuhaṣ-ṣiddīqu aftinā fī sab'i baqarātin simāniy ya'kuluhunna sab'un 'ijāfuw wa sab'i sumbulātin khuḍriw wa ukhara yābisāt(in), la'allī arji'u ilan-nāsi la'allahum ya'lamūn(a).
verses.translation: Йусуф, о человек (Господней) правды! Ты изъясни нам сон, (В котором) семь упитанных коров Поедены семью худыми; И семь зеленых колосков, И семь других - пожатых, - Чтобы я мог вернуться к людям И чтоб могли они понять

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ تَزْرَعُونَ سَبْعَ سِنِينَ دَأَبًا فَمَا حَصَدتُّمْ فَذَرُوهُ فِى سُنۢبُلِهِۦٓ إِلَّا قَلِيلًا مِّمَّا تَأْكُلُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَالَ تَزْرَعُونَ سَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':158'>بْ</tajweed>عَ سِنِينَ دَأَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':6693'>بًا ف</tajweed>َمَا حَصَ<tajweed class='idgh_mus' data-type='idgham-mutajanisayn' data-description='Idgham - Mutajanisayn' data-tajweed=':6694'>د</tajweed>تُّمْ فَذَرُوهُ فِى سُ<tajweed class='iqlb' data-type='iqlab' data-description='Iqlab' data-tajweed=':6695'>نۢب</tajweed>ُلِه<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِۦٓ</tajweed> إِلَّا قَلِيل<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6696'>اً م</tajweed>ِّ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َا تَأْكُل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qāla tazra'ūna sab'a sinīna da'abā(n), famā ḥaṣattum fa żarūhu fī sumbulihī illā qalīlam mimmā ta'kulūn(a).
verses.translation: (Йусуф) сказал: "Вы сеять будете семь лет Обычным образом для вас. И то, что будете сжинать, - В колосьях оставляйте, Помимо лишь немногого в еду

verses.text_uthmani: ثُمَّ يَأْتِى مِنۢ بَعْدِ ذَٰلِكَ سَبْعٌ شِدَادٌ يَأْكُلْنَ مَا قَدَّمْتُمْ لَهُنَّ إِلَّا قَلِيلًا مِّمَّا تُحْصِنُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ثُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َ يَأْتِى م<tajweed class='iqlb' data-type='iqlab' data-description='Iqlab' data-tajweed=':146'>ِنۢ ب</tajweed>َعْدِ ذ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>لِكَ سَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':6677'>بْ</tajweed><tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':6697'>عٌ ش</tajweed>ِدَا<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6698'>دٌ ي</tajweed>َأْكُلْنَ مَا قَدَّمْتُمْ لَهُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ إِلَّا قَلِيل<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6696'>اً م</tajweed>ِّ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َا تُحْصِن<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Ṡumma ya'tī mim ba'di żālika sab'un syidāduy ya'kulna mā qaddamtum lahunna illā qalīlam mimmā tuḥṣinūn(a).
verses.translation: А после этого семь тяжких лет наступят, Которые поглотят все, Что про запас вы отложили, Кроме немногого того, Что сбережете вы (для будущего сева)

verses.text_uthmani: ثُمَّ يَأْتِى مِنۢ بَعْدِ ذَٰلِكَ عَامٌ فِيهِ يُغَاثُ ٱلنَّاسُ وَفِيهِ يَعْصِرُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ثُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َ يَأْتِى م<tajweed class='iqlb' data-type='iqlab' data-description='Iqlab' data-tajweed=':146'>ِنۢ ب</tajweed>َعْدِ ذ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>لِكَ عَا<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':6699'>مٌ ف</tajweed>ِيهِ يُغَاثُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6700'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed><tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َاسُ وَفِيهِ يَعْصِر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Ṡumma ya'tī mim ba'di żālika 'āmun fīhi yugāṡun-nāsu wa fīhi ya'ṣirūn(a).
verses.translation: И вслед за тем наступит год, В который жители получат дождь обильный И будут выжимать (и масло, и вино себе на благо)

verses.text_uthmani: وَقَالَ ٱلْمَلِكُ ٱئْتُونِى بِهِۦ ۖ فَلَمَّا جَآءَهُ ٱلرَّسُولُ قَالَ ٱرْجِعْ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ فَسْـَٔلْهُ مَا بَالُ ٱلنِّسْوَةِ ٱلَّـٰتِى قَطَّعْنَ أَيْدِيَهُنَّ ۚ إِنَّ رَبِّى بِكَيْدِهِنَّ عَلِيمٌ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَقَالَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6674'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمَلِكُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6701'>ٱ</tajweed>ئْتُونِى بِه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed>‌ۖ فَلَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َا ج<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءَهُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6702'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>رَّسُولُ قَالَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6703'>ٱ</tajweed>رْجِعْ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ فَسْــَٔلْهُ مَا بَالُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6704'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa qālal-maliku'tūnī bih(ī), falammā jā'ahur-rasūlu qālarji' ilā rabbika fas'alhu mā bālun-niswatil-lātī qaṭṭa'na aidiyahunn(a), inna rabbī bikaidihinna 'alīm(un).
verses.translation: И царь сказал: "Ко мне его ведите!" Когда к нему пришел (царя) посланец, (Йусуф) сказал: "Ты к господину своему вернись и у него спроси: Каков настрой и помыслы тех женщин, Которые порезали себе (ножами) руки? Господь мой, истинно, про их уловки знает

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ مَا خَطْبُكُنَّ إِذْ رَٰوَدتُّنَّ يُوسُفَ عَن نَّفْسِهِۦ ۚ قُلْنَ حَـٰشَ لِلَّهِ مَا عَلِمْنَا عَلَيْهِ مِن سُوٓءٍ ۚ قَالَتِ ٱمْرَأَتُ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلْـَٔـٰنَ حَصْحَصَ ٱلْحَقُّ أَنَا۠ رَٰوَدتُّهُۥ عَن نَّفْسِهِۦ وَإِنَّهُۥ لَمِنَ ٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَالَ مَا خَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':6706'>طْ</tajweed>بُكُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ إِذْ ر<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>وَ<tajweed class='idgh_mus' data-type='idgham-mutajanisayn' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':5890'>َن ن</tajweed>َّفْسِه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed>‌ۚ قُلْنَ حَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>شَ لِلَّهِ مَا عَلِمْنَا عَلَيْهِ مِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':1847'>ن س</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>ٓ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':6708'>ءٍ‌ۚ ق</tajweed>َالَتِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':1864'>ٱ</tajweed>مْرَأَتُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6628'>ٱ</tajweed>لْعَزِيزِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6709'>ٱ</tajweed>لْـَٔ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>نَ حَصْحَصَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6710'>ٱ</tajweed>لْحَقُّ أَنَا۟ ر<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>وَ<tajweed class='idgh_mus' data-type='idgham-mutajanisayn' data-description='Idgham - Mutajanisayn' data-tajweed=':6635'>د</tajweed>تُّهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> ع<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':5890'>َن ن</tajweed>َّفْسِه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed> وَإِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> لَمِنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6711'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>صَّ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>دِق<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qāla mā khaṭbukunna iż rāwattunna yūsufa 'an nafsih(ī), qulna ḥāsya lillāhi mā 'alimnā 'alaihi min sū'(in), qālatimra'atul-'azīzil-āna ḥaṣḥaṣal-ḥaqq(u), ana rāwattuhū 'an nafsihī wa innahū laminaṣ-ṣādiqīn(a).
verses.translation: И (царь) спросил (тогда тех женщин): "В чем было ваше устремленье, Когда пытались вы Йусуфа соблазнить?" Они сказали: "Упаси нас Бог! За ним не знаем мы дурного". И молвила жена вельможи: "Открылась истина теперь. Его я соблазнить пыталась, Но он остался из (числа) правдивых

verses.text_uthmani: ذَٰلِكَ لِيَعْلَمَ أَنِّى لَمْ أَخُنْهُ بِٱلْغَيْبِ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَهْدِى كَيْدَ ٱلْخَآئِنِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ذ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>لِكَ لِيَعْلَمَ أَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>ِى لَمْ أَخُنْهُ بِ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13'>ٱ</tajweed>لْغَيْبِ وَأَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':859'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهَ لَا يَهْدِى كَيْدَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6712'>ٱ</tajweed>لْخ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓئِن<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Żālika liya'lama annī lam akhunhu bil-gaibi wa annallāha lā yahdī kaidal-khā'inīn(a).
verses.translation: (Я) это (говорю), чтоб (мой супруг) узнал, Что я в отсутствие его ему не изменила И что Аллах свершиться не позволит (Злым) умыслам изменников (неверных)

verses.text_uthmani: ۞ وَمَآ أُبَرِّئُ نَفْسِىٓ ۚ إِنَّ ٱلنَّفْسَ لَأَمَّارَةٌۢ بِٱلسُّوٓءِ إِلَّا مَا رَحِمَ رَبِّىٓ ۚ إِنَّ رَبِّى غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ۞ وَم<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أُبَرِّئُ نَفْس<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِىٓ‌ۚ</tajweed> إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6713'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed><tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َفْسَ لَأَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َارَ<tajweed class='iqlb' data-type='iqlab' data-description='Iqlab' data-tajweed=':6714'>ةُۢ ب</tajweed>ِ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':875'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سّ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>ٓءِ إِلَّا مَا رَحِمَ رَبّ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِىٓ‌ۚ</tajweed> إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ رَبِّى غَفُو<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':890'>رٌ ر</tajweed>َّح<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa mā ubarri'u nafsī, innan-nafsa la'ammāratum bis-sū'i illā mā raḥima rabbī, inna rabbī gafūrur raḥīm(un).
verses.translation: И я себя оправдывать не стану, - Ведь (всякая) душа склоняется ко злу, Если Господь мой милостью ее не осеняет. Господь мой, истинно, прощающ, милосерд

verses.text_uthmani: وَقَالَ ٱلْمَلِكُ ٱئْتُونِى بِهِۦٓ أَسْتَخْلِصْهُ لِنَفْسِى ۖ فَلَمَّا كَلَّمَهُۥ قَالَ إِنَّكَ ٱلْيَوْمَ لَدَيْنَا مَكِينٌ أَمِينٌ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَقَالَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6674'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمَلِكُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6701'>ٱ</tajweed>ئْتُونِى بِه<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِۦٓ</tajweed> أَسْتَخْلِصْهُ لِنَفْسِى‌ۖ فَلَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َا كَلَّمَهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> قَالَ إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َكَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6715'>ٱ</tajweed>لْيَوْمَ لَدَيْنَا مَكِينٌ أَم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa qālal-maliku'tūnī bihī astakhliṣhu linafsī, falammā kallamahū qāla innakal-yauma ladainā makīnun amīn(un).
verses.translation: И царь сказал: "Ко мне его ведите! Себе (на службу) я его возьму". И, с ним поговорив, сказал он: "Отныне ты при нас И нами наделен доверием и силой

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ ٱجْعَلْنِى عَلَىٰ خَزَآئِنِ ٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ إِنِّى حَفِيظٌ عَلِيمٌ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَالَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6716'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':6717'>جْ</tajweed>عَلْنِى عَلَىٰ خَز<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓئِنِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6718'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَرْضِ‌ۖ إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>ِى حَفِيظٌ عَل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qālaj'alnī 'alā khazā'inil-arḍ(i), innī ḥafīẓun 'alīm(un).
verses.translation: Йусуф ответил: "Поставь меня распорядителем хранилищ сей земли. Поистине, я - знающий хранитель

verses.text_uthmani: وَكَذَٰلِكَ مَكَّنَّا لِيُوسُفَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ يَتَبَوَّأُ مِنْهَا حَيْثُ يَشَآءُ ۚ نُصِيبُ بِرَحْمَتِنَا مَن نَّشَآءُ ۖ وَلَا نُضِيعُ أَجْرَ ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَكَذ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>لِكَ مَكَّ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا لِيُوسُفَ فِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':44'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَرْضِ يَتَبَوَّأُ مِنْهَا حَيْثُ يَش<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءُ‌ۚ نُصِيبُ بِرَحْمَتِنَا م<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':4211'>َن ن</tajweed>َّش<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءُ‌ۖ وَلَا نُضِيعُ أَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':2418'>جْ</tajweed>رَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':5898'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُحْسِن<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa każālika makkannā liyūsufa  fil-arḍi yatabawwa'u minhā ḥaiṡu yasyā'(u), nuṣību biraḥmatinā man nasyā'u wa lā nuḍī'u ajral-muḥsinīn(a).
verses.translation: Так наделили Мы Йусуфа силой в той стране, Чтоб в ней владел он всем, Как, где и когда захочет. Мы Нашу милость жалуем тому, Кого сочтем Своим желаньем, И не дадим пропасть награде Таких, кто делает добро

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَأَجْرُ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ خَيْرٌ لِّلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَكَانُوا۟ يَتَّقُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَلَأَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':6719'>جْ</tajweed>رُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6720'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَخِرَةِ خَيْ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':4005'>رٌ ل</tajweed>ِّلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> وَكَانُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> يَتَّق<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa la'ajrul-ākhirati khairul lil-lażīna āmanū wa kānū yattaqūn(a).
verses.translation: Награда же другого мира - краше Для тех, которые уверовали (в Бога) И, гнева Господа страшась, (благочестивы были)

verses.text_uthmani: وَجَآءَ إِخْوَةُ يُوسُفَ فَدَخَلُوا۟ عَلَيْهِ فَعَرَفَهُمْ وَهُمْ لَهُۥ مُنكِرُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَج<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءَ إِخْوَةُ يُوسُفَ فَدَخَلُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> عَلَيْهِ فَعَرَفَهُمْ وَهُمْ لَهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> مُ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':6721'>نك</tajweed>ِر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa jā'a ikhwatu yūsufa fa dakhalū 'alaihi fa 'arafahum wa hum lahū munkirūn(a).
verses.translation: И вот явились И предстали пред Йусуфом его братья. Узнал он их, Они ж его не распознали

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَمَّا جَهَّزَهُم بِجَهَازِهِمْ قَالَ ٱئْتُونِى بِأَخٍ لَّكُم مِّنْ أَبِيكُمْ ۚ أَلَا تَرَوْنَ أَنِّىٓ أُوفِى ٱلْكَيْلَ وَأَنَا۠ خَيْرُ ٱلْمُنزِلِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَلَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َا جَهَّزَه<tajweed class='ikhf_shfw' data-type='ikhafa-shafawi' data-description='Ikhafa' Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':6722'>ُم ب</tajweed>ِجَهَازِهِمْ قَالَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6723'>ٱ</tajweed>ئْتُونِى بِأَ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6724'>خٍ ل</tajweed>َّك<tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':556'>ُم م</tajweed>ِّنْ أَبِيكُمْ‌ۚ أَلَا تَرَوْنَ أَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِىٓ</tajweed> أُوفِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6725'>ٱ</tajweed>لْكَيْلَ وَأَنَا۟ خَيْرُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6726'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':6727'>نز</tajweed>ِل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa lammā jahhazahum bijahāzihim qāla'tūnī bi'akhil lakum min abīkum, alā tarauna annī ūfil-kaila wa ana khairul-munzilīn(a).
verses.translation: Когда он их провизией снабдил, (он) молвил: "Вы приведите брата своего, Что (сводный) по отцу вам. Ужель не видите, Что я даю сполна вам меру, (По соответствию уплате), И самый рАдушный хозяин

verses.text_uthmani: فَإِن لَّمْ تَأْتُونِى بِهِۦ فَلَا كَيْلَ لَكُمْ عِندِى وَلَا تَقْرَبُونِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَإ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':110'>ِن ل</tajweed>َّمْ تَأْتُونِى بِه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed> فَلَا كَيْلَ لَكُمْ عِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':4065'>ند</tajweed>ِى وَلَا تَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':6728'>قْ</tajweed>رَب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نِ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Fa illam ta'tūnī bihī falā kaila lakum 'indī wa lā taqrabūn(i).
verses.translation: Но если вы ко мне его не приведете, Для вас не будет меры у меня, И вы ко мне не подходите

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوا۟ سَنُرَٰوِدُ عَنْهُ أَبَاهُ وَإِنَّا لَفَـٰعِلُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَالُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> سَنُر<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>وِدُ عَنْهُ أَبَاهُ وَإِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا لَفَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>عِل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qālū sanurāwidu 'anhu abāhu wa innā lafā'ilūn(a).
verses.translation: Они ответили (ему): "Мы у отца его отпросим, И мы, конечно, сделаем, (что ты нам говоришь)

verses.text_uthmani: وَقَالَ لِفِتْيَـٰنِهِ ٱجْعَلُوا۟ بِضَـٰعَتَهُمْ فِى رِحَالِهِمْ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَعْرِفُونَهَآ إِذَا ٱنقَلَبُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰٓ أَهْلِهِمْ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَرْجِعُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَقَالَ لِفِتْيَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>نِهِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6729'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':6730'>جْ</tajweed>عَلُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> بِضَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>عَتَهُمْ فِى رِحَالِهِمْ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَعْرِفُونَه<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> إِذَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6731'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':6732'>نق</tajweed>َلَب<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ُوٓ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> إِلَ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ىٰٓ</tajweed> أَهْلِهِمْ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَرْجِع<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa qāla lifityānihij'alū biḍā'atahum fī riḥālihim la'allahum ya'rifūnahā iżanqalabū ilā ahlihim la'allahum yarji'ūn(a).
verses.translation: Своим же слугам он сказал: "Вы им в седельные вьюки Их (меновой) товар вложите, Чтоб обнаружили они его Только тогда, когда вернутся к своим семьям. Быть может, это их заставит возвратиться

verses.text_uthmani: فَلَمَّا رَجَعُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰٓ أَبِيهِمْ قَالُوا۟ يَـٰٓأَبَانَا مُنِعَ مِنَّا ٱلْكَيْلُ فَأَرْسِلْ مَعَنَآ أَخَانَا نَكْتَلْ وَإِنَّا لَهُۥ لَحَـٰفِظُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَلَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َا رَجَع<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ُوٓ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> إِلَ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ىٰٓ</tajweed> أَبِيهِمْ قَالُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> يَ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ـٰٓ</tajweed>أَبَانَا مُنِعَ مِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6733'>ٱ</tajweed>لْكَيْلُ فَأَرْسِلْ مَعَن<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَخَانَا نَكْتَلْ وَإِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا لَهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> لَحَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>فِظ<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Falammā raja'ū ilā abīhim qālū yā abānā muni'a minnal-kailu fa arsil ma'anā akhānā naktal wa innā lahū laḥāfiẓūn(a).
verses.translation: И вот когда они к отцу вернулись, Они сказали: "Наш отец! Нам отказали в мере (хлеба, Пока мы брата своего не приведем). Ты с нами брата нашего отправь, Тогда мы и получим меру. Мы будем, истинно, беречь его

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ هَلْ ءَامَنُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ إِلَّا كَمَآ أَمِنتُكُمْ عَلَىٰٓ أَخِيهِ مِن قَبْلُ ۖ فَٱللَّهُ خَيْرٌ حَـٰفِظًا ۖ وَهُوَ أَرْحَمُ ٱلرَّٰحِمِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَالَ هَلْ ءَامَنُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ إِلَّا كَم<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَمِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':6734'>نت</tajweed>ُكُمْ عَلَ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ىٰٓ</tajweed> أَخِيهِ مِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':128'>ن ق</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':129'>بْ</tajweed>لُ‌ۖ فَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':591'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهُ خَيْرٌ حَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>فِ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6735'>ظًا‌ۖ و</tajweed>َهُوَ أَرْحَمُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':5034'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>رّ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>حِم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qāla hal āmanukum 'alaihi illā kamā amintukum 'alā akhīhi min qabl(u), fallāhu khairun ḥāfiẓaw wa huwa arḥamur-rāḥimīn(a).
verses.translation: Сказал он (им): "Ужель могу доверить его вам, Как прежде его брата вам доверил? Аллах ведь лучший (для него) хранитель, Он - милосерднейший (из всех, кто) милосерд

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَمَّا فَتَحُوا۟ مَتَـٰعَهُمْ وَجَدُوا۟ بِضَـٰعَتَهُمْ رُدَّتْ إِلَيْهِمْ ۖ قَالُوا۟ يَـٰٓأَبَانَا مَا نَبْغِى ۖ هَـٰذِهِۦ بِضَـٰعَتُنَا رُدَّتْ إِلَيْنَا ۖ وَنَمِيرُ أَهْلَنَا وَنَحْفَظُ أَخَانَا وَنَزْدَادُ كَيْلَ بَعِيرٍ ۖ ذَٰلِكَ كَيْلٌ يَسِيرٌ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَلَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َا فَتَحُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> مَتَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>عَهُمْ وَجَدُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> بِضَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>عَتَهُمْ رُدَّتْ إِلَيْهِمْ‌ۖ قَالُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> يَ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ـٰٓ</tajweed>أَبَانَا مَا نَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':6736'>بْ</tajweed>غِى‌ۖ هَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>ذِه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed> بِضَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>عَتُنَا رُدَّتْ إِلَيْنَا‌ۖ وَنَمِيرُ أَهْلَنَا وَنَحْفَظُ أَخَانَا وَنَزْدَادُ كَيْلَ بَعِي<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':6737'>رٍ‌ۖ ذ</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>لِكَ كَيْ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6738'>لٌ ي</tajweed>َس<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>رٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa lammā fataḥū matā'ahum wajadū biḍā'atahum ruddat ilaihim, qālū yā abānā mā nabgī, hāżihī biḍā'atunā ruddat ilainā wa namīru ahlanā wa naḥfaẓu akhānā wa nazdādu kaila ba'īr(in), żālika kailuy yasīr(un).
verses.translation: Когда ж свои вьюки они открыли, Они увидели, что их товар им возвращен, И молвили они: "О наш отец! Чего же больше нам желать: Наш (меновой) товар нам возвращен, И мы свою семью прокормим И позаботимся о нашем брате, К тому ж прибавим мы теперь Меру (поклажи) одного верблюда, - Ведь эта мера так мала

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ لَنْ أُرْسِلَهُۥ مَعَكُمْ حَتَّىٰ تُؤْتُونِ مَوْثِقًا مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ لَتَأْتُنَّنِى بِهِۦٓ إِلَّآ أَن يُحَاطَ بِكُمْ ۖ فَلَمَّآ ءَاتَوْهُ مَوْثِقَهُمْ قَالَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ مَا نَقُولُ وَكِيلٌ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَالَ لَنْ أُرْسِلَهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> مَعَكُمْ حَتَّىٰ تُؤْتُونِ مَوْثِ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6739'>قًا م</tajweed>ِّنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':321'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهِ لَتَأْتُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َنِى بِه<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِۦٓ</tajweed> إِلّ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6740'>َن ي</tajweed>ُحَاطَ بِكُمْ‌ۖ فَلَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> ءَاتَوْهُ مَوْثِقَهُمْ قَالَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':1961'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهُ عَلَىٰ مَا نَقُولُ وَك<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>لٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qāla lan ursilahū ma'akum ḥattā tu'tūni mauṡiqam minallāhi lata'tunnanī bihī illā ayyuḥāṭa bikum, falammā ātauhu mauṡiqahum qālallāhu 'alā mā naqūlu wakīl(un).
verses.translation: Он (им) сказал: "Я с вами не пошлю его, Пока Аллахом вы не поклянетесь, Что вы ко мне его вернете (невредимым), Если, конечно, не постигнет вас (беда)". Когда же они клятву дали, он сказал: "Аллах за то, что здесь мы говорили, - поручитель

verses.text_uthmani: وَقَالَ يَـٰبَنِىَّ لَا تَدْخُلُوا۟ مِنۢ بَابٍ وَٰحِدٍ وَٱدْخُلُوا۟ مِنْ أَبْوَٰبٍ مُّتَفَرِّقَةٍ ۖ وَمَآ أُغْنِى عَنكُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ مِن شَىْءٍ ۖ إِنِ ٱلْحُكْمُ إِلَّا لِلَّهِ ۖ عَلَيْهِ تَوَكَّلْتُ ۖ وَعَلَيْهِ فَلْيَتَوَكَّلِ ٱلْمُتَوَكِّلُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَقَالَ يَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>بَنِىَّ لَا تَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':1176'>دْ</tajweed>خُلُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> م<tajweed class='iqlb' data-type='iqlab' data-description='Iqlab' data-tajweed=':6741'>ِنۢ ب</tajweed>َا<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6742'>بٍ و</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>حِ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6743'>دٍ و</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':281'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':281'>دْ</tajweed>خُلُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> مِنْ أَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':6744'>بْ</tajweed>و<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed><tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6745'>بٍ م</tajweed>ُّتَفَرِّقَ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6746'>ةٍ‌ۖ و</tajweed>َم<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أُغْنِى عَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':255'>نك</tajweed><tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':6747'>ُم م</tajweed>ِّنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':321'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهِ مِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':2103'>ن ش</tajweed>َىْءٍ‌ۖ إِنِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':4101'>ٱ</tajweed>لْحُكْمُ إِلَّا لِلَّهِ‌ۖ عَلَيْهِ تَوَكَّلْتُ‌ۖ وَعَلَيْهِ فَلْيَتَوَكَّلِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6748'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُتَوَكِّل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa qāla yā baniyya lā tadkhulū mim bābiw wāḥidiw wadkhulū min abwābim mutafarriqah(tin), wa mā ugnī 'ankum minallāhi min syai'(in), inil-ḥukmu illā lillāh(i), 'alaihi tawakkaltu wa 'alaihi  falyatawakkalil-mutawakkilūn(a).
verses.translation: И (далее) сказал: "О сыновья мои! Вы сразу все В одни ворота не входите, А по отдельности входите в разные врата. Но, впрочем, вас я не могу избавить От (провидения) Аллаха, - Ведь лишь Ему вся власть принадлежит. Лишь на Него я полагаюсь, И на Него пусть полагаются все те, Кто (всей душой) Ему предался

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَمَّا دَخَلُوا۟ مِنْ حَيْثُ أَمَرَهُمْ أَبُوهُم مَّا كَانَ يُغْنِى عَنْهُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ مِن شَىْءٍ إِلَّا حَاجَةً فِى نَفْسِ يَعْقُوبَ قَضَىٰهَا ۚ وَإِنَّهُۥ لَذُو عِلْمٍ لِّمَا عَلَّمْنَـٰهُ وَلَـٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَلَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َا دَخَلُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> مِنْ حَيْثُ أَمَرَهُمْ أَبُوه<tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':6749'>ُم م</tajweed>َّا كَانَ يُغْنِى عَنْه<tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':6750'>ُم م</tajweed>ِّنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':321'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهِ مِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':2103'>ن ش</tajweed>َىْءٍ إِلَّا حَاجَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':6751'>ةً ف</tajweed>ِى نَفْسِ يَعْقُوبَ قَضَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>هَا‌ۚ وَإِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> لَذُو عِلْ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6752'>مٍ ل</tajweed>ِّمَا عَلَّمْنَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>هُ وَلَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>كِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ أَكْثَرَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':1374'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed><tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َاسِ لَا يَعْلَم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa lammā dakhalū min ḥaiṡu amarahum abūhum, mā kāna yugnī 'anhum minallāhi min syai'in illā ḥājatan fī nafsi ya'qūba qaḍāhā, wa innahū lażū 'ilmil limā 'allamnāhu wa lākinna akṡaran-nāsi lā ya'lamūn(a).
verses.translation: Когда вошли они (в Египет) И где, и как им повелел отец, Их это не спасло ни от чего Из (мудрых замыслов) Аллаха, А только претворило в жизнь (Отцовское) желание Йакуба (Предостеречь их от беды), - Ведь обладал он знанием того, Чему его Мы научили. Но большинство людей (того) не знает

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَمَّا دَخَلُوا۟ عَلَىٰ يُوسُفَ ءَاوَىٰٓ إِلَيْهِ أَخَاهُ ۖ قَالَ إِنِّىٓ أَنَا۠ أَخُوكَ فَلَا تَبْتَئِسْ بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَلَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َا دَخَلُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> عَلَىٰ يُوسُفَ ءَاوَ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ىٰٓ</tajweed> إِلَيْهِ أَخَاهُ‌ۖ قَالَ إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِىٓ</tajweed> أَنَا۟ أَخُوكَ فَلَا تَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':6317'>بْ</tajweed>تَئِسْ بِمَا كَانُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> يَعْمَل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa lammā dakhalū 'alā yūsufa  āwā ilaihi akhāhu qāla innī akhūka falā tabta'is bimā kānū ya'malūn(a).
verses.translation: И вот когда они предстали пред Йусуфом, Он принял брата (в дом) к себе И так сказал: "Вот я - твой брат. И не печалься тем, что сделали они

verses.text_uthmani: فَلَمَّا جَهَّزَهُم بِجَهَازِهِمْ جَعَلَ ٱلسِّقَايَةَ فِى رَحْلِ أَخِيهِ ثُمَّ أَذَّنَ مُؤَذِّنٌ أَيَّتُهَا ٱلْعِيرُ إِنَّكُمْ لَسَـٰرِقُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَلَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َا جَهَّزَه<tajweed class='ikhf_shfw' data-type='ikhafa-shafawi' data-description='Ikhafa' Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':6722'>ُم ب</tajweed>ِجَهَازِهِمْ جَعَلَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6753'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سِّقَايَةَ فِى رَحْلِ أَخِيهِ ثُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َ أَذَّنَ مُؤَذِّنٌ أَيَّتُهَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6754'>ٱ</tajweed>لْعِيرُ إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َكُمْ لَسَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>رِق<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Falammā jahhazahum bijahāzihim ja'las-siqāyata fī raḥli akhīhi ṡumma ażżana mu'ażżinun ayyatuhal-'īru innakum lasāriqūn(a).
verses.translation: Когда же он провизией снабдил их, Он в ношу брата кубок положил. И возгласил потом глашатай: "О вы, кто в этом караване! Ведь воры вы, наверняка

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوا۟ وَأَقْبَلُوا۟ عَلَيْهِم مَّاذَا تَفْقِدُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَالُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> وَأَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':6755'>قْ</tajweed>بَلُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> عَلَيْه<tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':6756'>ِم م</tajweed>َّاذَا تَفْقِد<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qālū wa aqbalū 'alaihim māżā tafqidūn(a).
verses.translation: Те, повернувшись к ним, сказали: "Чего недосчитались вы

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوا۟ نَفْقِدُ صُوَاعَ ٱلْمَلِكِ وَلِمَن جَآءَ بِهِۦ حِمْلُ بَعِيرٍ وَأَنَا۠ بِهِۦ زَعِيمٌ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَالُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> نَفْقِدُ صُوَاعَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6757'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمَلِكِ وَلِمَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':6758'>ن ج</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءَ بِه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed> حِمْلُ بَعِي<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6759'>رٍ و</tajweed>َأَنَا۟ بِه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed> زَع<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qālū nafqidu ṣuwā'al-maliki wa liman jā'a bihī ḥimlu ba'īriw wa ana bihī za'īm(un).
verses.translation: Они ответили: "Мы ищем царский кубок. Тому, кто принесет его, Наградой станет вьюк верблюда, - За это я ручаюсь сам

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوا۟ تَٱللَّهِ لَقَدْ عَلِمْتُم مَّا جِئْنَا لِنُفْسِدَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا كُنَّا سَـٰرِقِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَالُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> تَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6760'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهِ لَقَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':2389'>دْ</tajweed> عَلِمْت<tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':6761'>ُم م</tajweed>َّا جِئْنَا لِنُفْسِدَ فِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':44'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَرْضِ وَمَا كُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا سَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>رِق<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qālū tallāhi laqad 'alimtum  mā ji'tanā linufsida fil-arḍi wa mā kunnā sāriqīn(a).
verses.translation: Они сказали: "Мы клянемся Богом! И вы ведь знаете, что мы На эту землю не пришли, Чтобы нечестие здесь сеять. И уж, конечно, мы не воры

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوا۟ فَمَا جَزَٰٓؤُهُۥٓ إِن كُنتُمْ كَـٰذِبِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَالُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> فَمَا جَز<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>ٓؤُهُ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ۥٓ</tajweed> إِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':109'>ن ك</tajweed>ُ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':100'>نت</tajweed>ُمْ كَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>ذِب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qālū famā jazā'uhū in kuntum kāżibīn(a).
verses.translation: (Им) отвечали (египтяне): "Каким быть наказанию (для вас), Коль вы окажетесь лжецами

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوا۟ جَزَٰٓؤُهُۥ مَن وُجِدَ فِى رَحْلِهِۦ فَهُوَ جَزَٰٓؤُهُۥ ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَالُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> جَز<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>ٓؤُهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> م<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6762'>َن و</tajweed>ُجِدَ فِى رَحْلِه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed> فَهُوَ جَز<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>ٓؤُهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed>‌ۚ كَذ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>لِكَ نَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':4214'>جْ</tajweed>زِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':4693'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>ظَّ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>لِم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qālū jazā'uhū maw wujida fī raḥlihī fa huwa jazā'uh(ū), każālika najziẓ-ẓālimīn(a).
verses.translation: Они сказали: "Наказание тому, в поклаже у кого найдется кубок, - То, что он станет вам вилланом, Как возмещение (за кражу), - Так воздаем мы злотворящим

verses.text_uthmani: فَبَدَأَ بِأَوْعِيَتِهِمْ قَبْلَ وِعَآءِ أَخِيهِ ثُمَّ ٱسْتَخْرَجَهَا مِن وِعَآءِ أَخِيهِ ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ كِدْنَا لِيُوسُفَ ۖ مَا كَانَ لِيَأْخُذَ أَخَاهُ فِى دِينِ ٱلْمَلِكِ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُ ۚ نَرْفَعُ دَرَجَـٰتٍ مَّن نَّشَآءُ ۗ وَفَوْقَ كُلِّ ذِى عِلْمٍ عَلِيمٌ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَبَدَأَ بِأَوْعِيَتِهِمْ قَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':3282'>بْ</tajweed>لَ وِع<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءِ أَخِيهِ ثُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6763'>ٱ</tajweed>سْتَخْرَجَهَا م<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6764'>ِن و</tajweed>ِع<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءِ أَخِيهِ‌ۚ كَذ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>لِكَ كِ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':6765'>دْ</tajweed>نَا لِيُوسُفَ‌ۖ مَا كَانَ لِيَأْخُذَ أَخَاهُ فِى دِينِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6766'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمَلِكِ إِلّ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':4201'>َن ي</tajweed>َش<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':4334'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهُ‌ۚ نَرْفَعُ دَرَجَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed><tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':4210'>تٍ م</tajweed>ّ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':4211'>َن ن</tajweed>َّش<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءُ‌ۗ وَفَوْقَ كُلِّ ذِى عِلْمٍ عَل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Fa bada'a bi'au'iyatihim qabla wi'ā'i akhīhi ṡummastakhrajahā miw wi'ā'i akhīh(i), każālika kidnā liyūsuf(a), mā kāna liya'khuża akhāhu fī dīnil-maliki illā ay yasyā'allāh(u), narfa'u darajātim man nasyā'(u), wa fauqa kulli żī 'ilmin 'alīm(un).
verses.translation: И начал поиск он с поклажи их, Прежде чем (вещи) брата (обыскать); Потом извлек он (кубок) из поклажи брата: Такой была Наша уловка для Йусуфа, И он не смог бы брата взять себе Согласно царскому указу, Если б того не пожелал Аллах. Мы степенями возвышаем тех, Кого сочтем Своей угодой. Ведь выше всякого, кто обладает знаньем, Лишь Тот, Кто знает все и вся

verses.text_uthmani: ۞ قَالُوٓا۟ إِن يَسْرِقْ فَقَدْ سَرَقَ أَخٌ لَّهُۥ مِن قَبْلُ ۚ فَأَسَرَّهَا يُوسُفُ فِى نَفْسِهِۦ وَلَمْ يُبْدِهَا لَهُمْ ۚ قَالَ أَنتُمْ شَرٌّ مَّكَانًا ۖ وَٱللَّهُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا تَصِفُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ۞ قَال<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ُوٓ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> إ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6767'>ِن ي</tajweed>َسْرِ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':6768'>قْ</tajweed> فَقَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':563'>دْ</tajweed> سَرَقَ أَ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6769'>خٌ ل</tajweed>َّهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> مِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':128'>ن ق</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':129'>بْ</tajweed>لُ‌ۚ فَأَسَرَّهَا يُوسُفُ فِى نَفْسِه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed> وَلَمْ يُ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':6770'>بْ</tajweed>دِهَا لَهُمْ‌ۚ قَالَ أَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':428'>نت</tajweed>ُمْ شَ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':3659'>رٌّ م</tajweed>َّكَا<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6771'>نًا‌ۖ و</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':72'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا تَصِف<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qālū iy yasriq faqad saraqa akhul lahū min qabl(u), fa asarrahā yūsufu fī nafsihī wa lam yubdihā lahum, qāla antum syarrum makānā(n), wallāhu a'lamu bimā taṣifūn(a).
verses.translation: Они сказали: "Если он украл, так ведь украл и прежде его брат". И схоронил в душе это Йусуф И им не выказал (своих обид и намерений). (А про себя) сказал: "Вы в худшем положении, чем мы. Аллах ведь лучше знает то, О чем вы речь ведете

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوا۟ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْعَزِيزُ إِنَّ لَهُۥٓ أَبًا شَيْخًا كَبِيرًا فَخُذْ أَحَدَنَا مَكَانَهُۥٓ ۖ إِنَّا نَرَىٰكَ مِنَ ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَالُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> يَ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ـٰٓ</tajweed>أَيُّهَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6772'>ٱ</tajweed>لْعَزِيزُ إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ لَهُ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ۥٓ</tajweed> أَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':6773'>بًا ش</tajweed>َيْ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':6774'>خًا ك</tajweed>َبِي<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':6775'>رًا ف</tajweed>َخُذْ أَحَدَنَا مَكَانَهُ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ۥٓ‌ۖ</tajweed> إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا نَرَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ٮٰ</tajweed>كَ مِنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':4754'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُحْسِن<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qālū yā ayyuhal-'azīzu inna lahū aban syaikhan kabīran fa khuż aḥadanā makānah(ū), innā narāka minal-muḥsinīn(a).
verses.translation: Они сказали: "О вельможа! Отец его - глубокий и почтенный старец (И будет горевать о нем). Возьми вместо него кого-нибудь из нас, - Мы видим: ты в делах великодушен

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ مَعَاذَ ٱللَّهِ أَن نَّأْخُذَ إِلَّا مَن وَجَدْنَا مَتَـٰعَنَا عِندَهُۥٓ إِنَّآ إِذًا لَّظَـٰلِمُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَالَ مَعَاذَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6605'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهِ أ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6776'>َن ن</tajweed>َّأْخُذَ إِلَّا م<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6777'>َن و</tajweed>َجَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':3834'>دْ</tajweed>نَا مَتَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>عَنَا عِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':719'>ند</tajweed>َهُ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ۥٓ</tajweed> إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> إِ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6778'>ذًا ل</tajweed>َّظَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>لِم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qāla ma'āżallāhi an na'khuża illā maw wajadnā matā'anā 'indah(ū), innā iżal laẓālimūn(a).
verses.translation: Он (им) ответил: "Упаси Господь нам взять кого-либо другого, Кроме того, в чьей личной клади Мы нашу собственность нашли. Иначе были бы неправедными мы
