verses.text_uthmani: فَلَمَّا ٱسْتَيْـَٔسُوا۟ مِنْهُ خَلَصُوا۟ نَجِيًّا ۖ قَالَ كَبِيرُهُمْ أَلَمْ تَعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّ أَبَاكُمْ قَدْ أَخَذَ عَلَيْكُم مَّوْثِقًا مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَمِن قَبْلُ مَا فَرَّطتُمْ فِى يُوسُفَ ۖ فَلَنْ أَبْرَحَ ٱلْأَرْضَ حَتَّىٰ يَأْذَنَ لِىٓ أَبِىٓ أَوْ يَحْكُمَ ٱللَّهُ لِى ۖ وَهُوَ خَيْرُ ٱلْحَـٰكِمِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَلَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6779'>ٱ</tajweed>سْتَيْــَٔسُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> مِنْهُ خَلَصُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> نَجِي<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':6780'>ًّا‌ۖ ق</tajweed>َالَ كَبِيرُهُمْ أَلَمْ تَعْلَم<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ُوٓ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> أَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ أَبَاكُمْ قَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':298'>دْ</tajweed> أَخَذَ عَلَيْك<tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':6781'>ُم م</tajweed>َّوْثِ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6739'>قًا م</tajweed>ِّنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':321'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهِ وَمِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':6432'>ن ق</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':129'>بْ</tajweed>لُ مَا فَرَّطتُمْ فِى يُوسُفَ‌ۖ فَلَنْ أَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':6782'>بْ</tajweed>رَحَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6783'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَرْضَ حَتَّىٰ يَأْذَنَ ل<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِىٓ</tajweed> أَب<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِىٓ</tajweed> أَوْ يَحْكُمَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':4856'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهُ لِى‌ۖ وَهُوَ خَيْرُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':4857'>ٱ</tajweed>لْحَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>كِم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Falammastai'asū minhu khalaṣū najiyyā(n), qāla kabīruhum alam ta'lamū anna abākum qad akhaża 'alaikum mauṡiqam minallāhi wa min qablu mā farrattum fī yūsufa falan abraḥal-arḍa ḥattā ya'żana lī abī au yaḥkumallāhu lī, wa huwa khairul-ḥākimīn(a).
verses.translation: Когда ж отчаялись они В его (содействии их просьбе), То удалились, чтоб наедине посовещаться, И старший их сказал: "Ужель не знаете, что ваш отец Взял клятву с вас перед Аллахом? И прежде этого с Йусуфом Не совершили вы того, что надлежало вам (Согласно обещанию отцу). А потому я не покину эту землю, Пока отец не разрешит мне Иль не решит иначе для меня Аллах: Он - лучший из (дающих мудрые) решенья

verses.text_uthmani: ٱرْجِعُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰٓ أَبِيكُمْ فَقُولُوا۟ يَـٰٓأَبَانَآ إِنَّ ٱبْنَكَ سَرَقَ وَمَا شَهِدْنَآ إِلَّا بِمَا عَلِمْنَا وَمَا كُنَّا لِلْغَيْبِ حَـٰفِظِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ٱرْجِع<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ُوٓ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> إِلَ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ىٰٓ</tajweed> أَبِيكُمْ فَقُولُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> يَ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ـٰٓ</tajweed>أَبَان<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6784'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':6785'>بْ</tajweed>نَكَ سَرَقَ وَمَا شَهِ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':4421'>دْ</tajweed>ن<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> إِلَّا بِمَا عَلِمْنَا وَمَا كُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا لِلْغَيْبِ حَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>فِظ<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Irji'ū ilā abīkum fa qūlū yā abānā innabnaka saraq(a), wa mā syahidnā illā bimā 'alimnā wa mā kunnā lil-gaibi ḥāfiẓīn(a).
verses.translation: Вы возвращайтесь к вашему отцу И (там) ему скажите: "О наш отец! Твой сын украл, И мы свидетельствуем только то, что знаем. Мы (никого) не можем уберечь (Ни от чего, что нам) незримо Или (от нас) сокрыто (кем-то)

verses.text_uthmani: وَسْـَٔلِ ٱلْقَرْيَةَ ٱلَّتِى كُنَّا فِيهَا وَٱلْعِيرَ ٱلَّتِىٓ أَقْبَلْنَا فِيهَا ۖ وَإِنَّا لَصَـٰدِقُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَسْــَٔلِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6786'>ٱ</tajweed>لْقَرْيَةَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6787'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّتِى كُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا فِيهَا وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6788'>ٱ</tajweed>لْعِيرَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6789'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّت<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِىٓ</tajweed> أَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':6790'>قْ</tajweed>بَلْنَا فِيهَا‌ۖ وَإِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا لَصَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>دِق<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Was'alil-qaryatal-latī kunnā fīhā wal-'īral-latī aqbalnā fīhā, wa innā laṣādiqūn(a).
verses.translation: (Вели) спросить селенье, где мы были, И караван, с которым шли мы, (И ты увидишь), что мы правду говорим

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ بَلْ سَوَّلَتْ لَكُمْ أَنفُسُكُمْ أَمْرًا ۖ فَصَبْرٌ جَمِيلٌ ۖ عَسَى ٱللَّهُ أَن يَأْتِيَنِى بِهِمْ جَمِيعًا ۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلْعَلِيمُ ٱلْحَكِيمُ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَالَ بَلْ سَوَّلَتْ لَكُمْ أَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':6579'>نف</tajweed>ُسُكُمْ أَمْ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':6580'>رًا‌ۖ ف</tajweed>َصَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':6581'>بْ</tajweed><tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':6582'>رٌ ج</tajweed>َمِيلٌ‌ۖ عَسَى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':2982'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهُ أ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6791'>َن ي</tajweed>َأْتِيَنِى بِهِمْ جَمِيعًا‌ۚ إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> هُوَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6792'>ٱ</tajweed>لْعَلِيمُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':171'>ٱ</tajweed>لْحَك<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مُ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qāla bal sawwalat lakum anfusukum amrā(n), fa ṣabrun jamīl(un), 'asallāhu ay ya'tiyanī bihim jamī'ā(n), innahū huwal-'alīmul-ḥakīm(u).
verses.translation: Отец сказал: "О нет! Вам души ваши (подсказали) Все это дело (вымыслом) украсить. (Отныне для меня) прекрасно лишь терпенье. Аллах, быть может, мне вернет их всех, - Поистине, Он знающ, мудр (безмерно)

verses.text_uthmani: وَتَوَلَّىٰ عَنْهُمْ وَقَالَ يَـٰٓأَسَفَىٰ عَلَىٰ يُوسُفَ وَٱبْيَضَّتْ عَيْنَاهُ مِنَ ٱلْحُزْنِ فَهُوَ كَظِيمٌ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَتَوَلَّىٰ عَنْهُمْ وَقَالَ يَ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ـٰٓ</tajweed>أَسَفَىٰ عَلَىٰ يُوسُفَ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6793'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':6793'>بْ</tajweed>يَضَّتْ عَيْنَاهُ مِنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6794'>ٱ</tajweed>لْحُزْنِ فَهُوَ كَظ<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa tawallā 'anhum wa qāla yā asafā 'alā yūsufa wabyaḍḍat 'aināhu minal-ḥuzni fa huwa kaẓīm(un).
verses.translation: И отвернулся он от них и молвил: "Как велико мое страданье по Йусуфу!" И побелели от печали его очи, И он едва мог скорбь сдержать

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوا۟ تَٱللَّهِ تَفْتَؤُا۟ تَذْكُرُ يُوسُفَ حَتَّىٰ تَكُونَ حَرَضًا أَوْ تَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلْهَـٰلِكِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَالُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> تَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6760'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهِ تَفْتَؤُ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> تَذْكُرُ يُوسُفَ حَتَّىٰ تَكُونَ حَرَضًا أَوْ تَكُونَ مِنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6795'>ٱ</tajweed>لْهَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>لِك<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qālū tallāhi tafta'u tażkuru yūsufa ḥattā takūna ḥaraḍan au takūna minal-hālikīn(a).
verses.translation: Они сказали: "Именем Аллаха! Не перестанешь ты Йусуфа вспоминать, Пока (печаль) не исчерпает твои силы Иль не постигнет смерть тебя

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ إِنَّمَآ أَشْكُوا۟ بَثِّى وَحُزْنِىٓ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ وَأَعْلَمُ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَالَ إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َم<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَشْكُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> بَثِّى وَحُزْن<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِىٓ</tajweed> إِلَى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':1637'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهِ وَأَعْلَمُ مِنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':321'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهِ مَا لَا تَعْلَم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qāla innamā asykū baṡṡī wa ḥuznī ilallāhi wa a'lamu minallāhi mā lā ta'lamūn(a).
verses.translation: Но он сказал: "Я предаю свою печаль и скорбь Аллаху, - Ведь от Него известно мне, О чем не ведаете вы

verses.text_uthmani: يَـٰبَنِىَّ ٱذْهَبُوا۟ فَتَحَسَّسُوا۟ مِن يُوسُفَ وَأَخِيهِ وَلَا تَا۟يْـَٔسُوا۟ مِن رَّوْحِ ٱللَّهِ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ لَا يَا۟يْـَٔسُ مِن رَّوْحِ ٱللَّهِ إِلَّا ٱلْقَوْمُ ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: يَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>بَنِىَّ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6796'>ٱ</tajweed>ذْهَبُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> فَتَحَسَّسُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> م<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6797'>ِن ي</tajweed>ُوسُفَ وَأَخِيهِ وَلَا تَ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed>يْــَٔسُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> م<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6798'>ِن ر</tajweed>َّوْحِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6799'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهِ‌ۖ إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> لَا يَ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed>يْــَٔسُ م<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6798'>ِن ر</tajweed>َّوْحِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6799'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهِ إِلَّا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':4061'>ٱ</tajweed>لْقَوْمُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6800'>ٱ</tajweed>لْكَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>فِر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Yā baniyyażhabū fa taḥassasū miy yūsufa wa akhīhi wa lā tai'asū mir rauḥillāh(i), innahū lā yai'asu mir rauḥillāhi illal-qaumul-kāfirūn(a).
verses.translation: О сыновья мои! Ступайте И разузнайте о Йусуфе, а также его брате. И никогда надежды не теряйте На милость и отзывчивость Аллаха, - Надежды на Него, поистине, теряют Лишь те, кто не уверовал в Него

verses.text_uthmani: فَلَمَّا دَخَلُوا۟ عَلَيْهِ قَالُوا۟ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْعَزِيزُ مَسَّنَا وَأَهْلَنَا ٱلضُّرُّ وَجِئْنَا بِبِضَـٰعَةٍ مُّزْجَىٰةٍ فَأَوْفِ لَنَا ٱلْكَيْلَ وَتَصَدَّقْ عَلَيْنَآ ۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَجْزِى ٱلْمُتَصَدِّقِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَلَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َا دَخَلُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> عَلَيْهِ قَالُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> يَ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ـٰٓ</tajweed>أَيُّهَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6772'>ٱ</tajweed>لْعَزِيزُ مَسَّنَا وَأَهْلَنَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6801'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>ضُّرُّ وَجِئْنَا بِبِضَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>عَ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6802'>ةٍ م</tajweed>ُّزْجَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed><tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':6803'>ةٍ ف</tajweed>َأَوْفِ لَنَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6804'>ٱ</tajweed>لْكَيْلَ وَتَصَدَّ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':6805'>قْ</tajweed> عَلَيْن<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ‌ۖ</tajweed> إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':80'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهَ يَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':6806'>جْ</tajweed>زِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6807'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُتَصَدِّق<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Falammā dakhalū 'alaihi qālū yā ayyuhal-'azīzu massanā wa ahlanaḍ-ḍurru wa ji'nā bibiḍā'atim muzjātin fa aufi lanal-kaila wa taṣaddaq 'alainā, innallāha yajzil-mutaṣaddiqīn(a).
verses.translation: Когда они явились (вновь) перед Йусуфом, Они сказали: "О вельможа! Беда постигла нас и всю нашу семью, И (меновой) товар наш скуден. Дай меру нам сполна и окажи нам милость, - Аллах, поистине, воздаст оказывающим милость

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ هَلْ عَلِمْتُم مَّا فَعَلْتُم بِيُوسُفَ وَأَخِيهِ إِذْ أَنتُمْ جَـٰهِلُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَالَ هَلْ عَلِمْت<tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':6761'>ُم م</tajweed>َّا فَعَلْت<tajweed class='ikhf_shfw' data-type='ikhafa-shafawi' data-description='Ikhafa' Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':6808'>ُم ب</tajweed>ِيُوسُفَ وَأَخِيهِ إِذْ أَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':428'>نت</tajweed>ُمْ جَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>هِل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qāla hal 'alimtum mā fa'altum biyūsufa wa akhīhi iż antum jāhilūn(a).
verses.translation: Он (им) ответил: "Знаете ли вы, как поступили вы с Йусуфом И его (младшим) братом, Когда вы по неведению (зло творили)

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوٓا۟ أَءِنَّكَ لَأَنتَ يُوسُفُ ۖ قَالَ أَنَا۠ يُوسُفُ وَهَـٰذَآ أَخِى ۖ قَدْ مَنَّ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيْنَآ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ مَن يَتَّقِ وَيَصْبِرْ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُضِيعُ أَجْرَ ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَال<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ُوٓ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> أَءِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َكَ لَأَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':6457'>نت</tajweed>َ يُوسُفُ‌ۖ قَالَ أَنَا۟ يُوسُفُ وَهَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>ذ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَخِى‌ۖ قَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':298'>دْ</tajweed> مَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':2390'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهُ عَلَيْن<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ‌ۖ</tajweed> إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> م<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6809'>َن ي</tajweed>َتَّقِ وَيَصْبِرْ فَإِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':513'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهَ لَا يُضِيعُ أَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':2418'>جْ</tajweed>رَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':5898'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُحْسِن<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qālū a'innaka la'anta yūsuf(u), qāla ana yūsufu wa hāżā akhī qad mannallāhu 'alainā, innahū may yataqqi wa yaṣbir fa innallāha lā yuḍī'u ajral-muḥsinīn(a).
verses.translation: Ужель и вправду ты - Йусуф? - они сказали. Он им ответил: Я - Йусуф, а это - брат мой. Аллах нам милость оказал: Ведь те, кто, истинно, страшится Его (гнева) И терпеливо-стоек (в благочестии своем), - Так ведь награде тех, кто делает добро, Аллах не даст погибнуть

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوا۟ تَٱللَّهِ لَقَدْ ءَاثَرَكَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيْنَا وَإِن كُنَّا لَخَـٰطِـِٔينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَالُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> تَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6760'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهِ لَقَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':2389'>دْ</tajweed> ءَاثَرَكَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6810'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهُ عَلَيْنَا وَإِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':4542'>ن ك</tajweed>ُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا لَخَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>طِــٔ<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qālū tallāhi laqad āṡarakallāhu 'alainā wa in kunnā lakhāṭi'īn(a).
verses.translation: Во имя Божие! - ответили они. - Аллах, поистине, тебя пред нами предпочел, И, истинно, мы были во грехе

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ لَا تَثْرِيبَ عَلَيْكُمُ ٱلْيَوْمَ ۖ يَغْفِرُ ٱللَّهُ لَكُمْ ۖ وَهُوَ أَرْحَمُ ٱلرَّٰحِمِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَالَ لَا تَثْرِيبَ عَلَيْكُمُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6811'>ٱ</tajweed>لْيَوْمَ‌ۖ يَغْفِرُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6812'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهُ لَكُمْ‌ۖ وَهُوَ أَرْحَمُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':5034'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>رّ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>حِم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qāla lā taṡrība 'alaikumul-yaum(a), wa yagfirullāhu lakum, wa huwa arḥamur-rāḥimīn(a).
verses.translation: Сказал он: "Нынешнего дня над вами нет (моих) упреков. Простит Аллах вам (прошлые грехи). Он - милосерднейший из всех, кто милосерден

verses.text_uthmani: ٱذْهَبُوا۟ بِقَمِيصِى هَـٰذَا فَأَلْقُوهُ عَلَىٰ وَجْهِ أَبِى يَأْتِ بَصِيرًا وَأْتُونِى بِأَهْلِكُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ٱذْهَبُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> بِقَمِيصِى هَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>ذَا فَأَلْقُوهُ عَلَىٰ وَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':1611'>جْ</tajweed>هِ أَبِى يَأْتِ بَصِي<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6813'>رًا و</tajweed>َأْتُونِى بِأَهْلِكُمْ أَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':825'>جْ</tajweed>مَع<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Iżhabū biqamīṣī hāżā fa alqūhu 'alā wajhi abī ya'ti baṣīrā(n), wa'tūnī bi'ahlikum ajma'īn(a).
verses.translation: Идите вы (к отцу) с моей рубахой И там ее набросьте на его лицо. Прозреет он тогда, И вы ко мне со всей семьей придете

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَمَّا فَصَلَتِ ٱلْعِيرُ قَالَ أَبُوهُمْ إِنِّى لَأَجِدُ رِيحَ يُوسُفَ ۖ لَوْلَآ أَن تُفَنِّدُونِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَلَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َا فَصَلَتِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6814'>ٱ</tajweed>لْعِيرُ قَالَ أَبُوهُمْ إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>ِى لَأَجِدُ رِيحَ يُوسُفَ‌ۖ لَوْل<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':6815'>ن ت</tajweed>ُفَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>ِد<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نِ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa lammā faṣalatil-'īru qāla abūhum innī la'ajidu rīḥa yūsufa lau lā an tufannidūn(i).
verses.translation: И вот когда (в обратный путь) их караван пустился, Отец их вдруг сказал: "Я ощущаю дух Йусуфа. Только не думайте, что я - безумец (старый)

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوا۟ تَٱللَّهِ إِنَّكَ لَفِى ضَلَـٰلِكَ ٱلْقَدِيمِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَالُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> تَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6760'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهِ إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َكَ لَفِى ضَلَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>لِكَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6816'>ٱ</tajweed>لْقَد<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مِ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qālū tallāhi innaka lafī ḍalālikal-qadīm(i).
verses.translation: И те, (кто слышал), отвечали: "Клянемся именем Аллаха, Ты в старческом бреду блуждаешь

verses.text_uthmani: فَلَمَّآ أَن جَآءَ ٱلْبَشِيرُ أَلْقَىٰهُ عَلَىٰ وَجْهِهِۦ فَٱرْتَدَّ بَصِيرًا ۖ قَالَ أَلَمْ أَقُل لَّكُمْ إِنِّىٓ أَعْلَمُ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَلَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':6417'>ن ج</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6817'>ٱ</tajweed>لْبَشِيرُ أَلْقَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>هُ عَلَىٰ وَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':6818'>جْ</tajweed>هِه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed> فَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6819'>ٱ</tajweed>رْتَدَّ بَصِي<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':6820'>رًا‌ۖ ق</tajweed>َالَ أَلَمْ أَقُل لَّكُمْ إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِىٓ</tajweed> أَعْلَمُ مِنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':321'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهِ مَا لَا تَعْلَم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Falammā an jā'al-basyīru alqāhu 'alā wajihihī fartadda baṣīrā(n), qāla alam aqul lakum, innī a'lamu minallāhi mā lā ta'lamūn(a).
verses.translation: Когда ж явился благовестник, Набросил он (рубаху) на его лицо, И вмиг прозрел (почтенный старец) И молвил им: "Не я ль вам говорил, Что мне известно от Аллаха, О чем не ведаете вы

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوا۟ يَـٰٓأَبَانَا ٱسْتَغْفِرْ لَنَا ذُنُوبَنَآ إِنَّا كُنَّا خَـٰطِـِٔينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَالُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> يَ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ـٰٓ</tajweed>أَبَانَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6821'>ٱ</tajweed>سْتَغْفِرْ لَنَا ذُنُوبَن<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا كُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا خَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>طِــٔ<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qālū yā abānastagfir lanā żunūbanā innā kunnā khāṭi'īn(a).
verses.translation: О наш отец! - они сказали. - Проси прощенья нам за наши прегрешенья, - Ведь, истинно, мы были во грехе

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ سَوْفَ أَسْتَغْفِرُ لَكُمْ رَبِّىٓ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلْغَفُورُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَالَ سَوْفَ أَسْتَغْفِرُ لَكُمْ رَبّ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِىٓ‌ۖ</tajweed> إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> هُوَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6822'>ٱ</tajweed>لْغَفُورُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6228'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>رَّح<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مُ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qāla saufa astagfiru lakum rabbī, innahū huwal-gafūrur-raḥīm(u).
verses.translation: Я буду, - он ответил (им), - Молить прощения для вас у моего Владыки, - Он, истинно, прощающ, милосерд

verses.text_uthmani: فَلَمَّا دَخَلُوا۟ عَلَىٰ يُوسُفَ ءَاوَىٰٓ إِلَيْهِ أَبَوَيْهِ وَقَالَ ٱدْخُلُوا۟ مِصْرَ إِن شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ ءَامِنِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَلَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َا دَخَلُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> عَلَىٰ يُوسُفَ ءَاوَ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ىٰٓ</tajweed> إِلَيْهِ أَبَوَيْهِ وَقَالَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6823'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':278'>دْ</tajweed>خُلُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> مِصْرَ إِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':364'>ن ش</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':78'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهُ ءَامِن<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Falammā dakhalū 'alā yūsufa āwā ilaihi abawaihi wa qāladkhulū miṣra in syā'allāhu āminīn(a).
verses.translation: И вот когда они явились пред Йусуфом, Он предоставил свой очаг Родителям своим и молвил: "Вступите на Египетскую землю, Если Аллаху так угодно, В надежной безопасности ее

verses.text_uthmani: وَرَفَعَ أَبَوَيْهِ عَلَى ٱلْعَرْشِ وَخَرُّوا۟ لَهُۥ سُجَّدًا ۖ وَقَالَ يَـٰٓأَبَتِ هَـٰذَا تَأْوِيلُ رُءْيَـٰىَ مِن قَبْلُ قَدْ جَعَلَهَا رَبِّى حَقًّا ۖ وَقَدْ أَحْسَنَ بِىٓ إِذْ أَخْرَجَنِى مِنَ ٱلسِّجْنِ وَجَآءَ بِكُم مِّنَ ٱلْبَدْوِ مِنۢ بَعْدِ أَن نَّزَغَ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ بَيْنِى وَبَيْنَ إِخْوَتِىٓ ۚ إِنَّ رَبِّى لَطِيفٌ لِّمَا يَشَآءُ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلْعَلِيمُ ٱلْحَكِيمُ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَرَفَعَ أَبَوَيْهِ عَلَى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':4740'>ٱ</tajweed>لْعَرْشِ وَخَرُّو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> لَهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> سُجَّ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6824'>دًا‌ۖ و</tajweed>َقَالَ يَ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ـٰٓ</tajweed>أَبَتِ هَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>ذَا تَأْوِيلُ رُءْيَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>ىَ مِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':128'>ن ق</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':129'>بْ</tajweed>لُ قَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':298'>دْ</tajweed> جَعَلَهَا رَبِّى حَق<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6825'>ًّا‌ۖ و</tajweed>َقَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':387'>دْ</tajweed> أَحْسَنَ ب<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِىٓ</tajweed> إِذْ أَخْرَجَنِى مِنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6826'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سِّ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':6659'>جْ</tajweed>نِ وَج<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءَ بِك<tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':6827'>ُم م</tajweed>ِّنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6828'>ٱ</tajweed>لْبَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':6829'>دْ</tajweed>وِ م<tajweed class='iqlb' data-type='iqlab' data-description='Iqlab' data-tajweed=':146'>ِنۢ ب</tajweed>َعْدِ أ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6830'>َن ن</tajweed>َّزَغَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6831'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>شَّيْطَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>نُ بَيْنِى وَبَيْنَ إِخْوَت<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِىٓ‌ۚ</tajweed> إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ رَبِّى لَطِي<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6832'>فٌ ل</tajweed>ِّمَا يَش<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءُ‌ۚ إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> هُوَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6792'>ٱ</tajweed>لْعَلِيمُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':171'>ٱ</tajweed>لْحَك<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مُ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa rafa'a abawaihi 'alal-'arsyi wa kharrū lahū sujjadā(n), wa qāla yā abati hāżā ta'wīlu ru'yāya min qabl(u), qad ja'alahā rabbī ḥaqqā(n), wa qad aḥsana bī iż akhrajanī minas-sijni wa jā'a bikum minal-badwi mim ba'di an nazagasy-syaiṭānu bainī wa baina ikhwatī, inna rabbī laṭīful limā yasyā'(u), innahū huwal-'alīmul-ḥakīm(u).
verses.translation: И он родителей своих Возвысил высоко на троне чести, И пали (братья) ниц пред ним. И молвил он: "О мой отец! Вот как толкуется мой сон далеких лет! Аллах осуществил его и оказал мне милость, Когда Он из темницы вызволил меня, А вас сюда доставил из пустыни, После того как Сатана Вражду посеял между мной и братьями моими, - Ведь благосклонен мой Господь К тому, что (мудростью Своею) пожелает, (Своим всеведением предпочтет), - Поистине, Он знает (все) и мудр (безмерно)

verses.text_uthmani: ۞ رَبِّ قَدْ ءَاتَيْتَنِى مِنَ ٱلْمُلْكِ وَعَلَّمْتَنِى مِن تَأْوِيلِ ٱلْأَحَادِيثِ ۚ فَاطِرَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ أَنتَ وَلِىِّۦ فِى ٱلدُّنْيَا وَٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ ۖ تَوَفَّنِى مُسْلِمًا وَأَلْحِقْنِى بِٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ۞ رَبِّ قَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':298'>دْ</tajweed> ءَاتَيْتَنِى مِنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':2845'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُلْكِ وَعَلَّمْتَنِى مِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':6551'>ن ت</tajweed>َأْوِيلِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6552'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَحَادِيثِ‌ۚ فَاطِرَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6833'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سَّمَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>و<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>تِ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':177'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَرْضِ أَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':169'>نت</tajweed>َ وَلِىّ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed> فِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':599'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>دُّنْيَا وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':1213'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَخِرَةِ‌ۖ تَوَفَّنِى مُسْلِ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6834'>مًا و</tajweed>َأَلْحِ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':6835'>قْ</tajweed>نِى بِ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6836'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>صَّ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>لِح<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Rabbi qad ātaitanī minal-mulki wa 'allamtanī min ta'wīlil-aḥādīṡ(i), fāṭiras-samāwāti wal-arḍ(i), anta waliyyī fid-dun-yā wal-ākhirah(ti), tawaffanī muslimaw wa alḥiqnī biṣ-ṣāliḥīn(a).
verses.translation: О мой Господь! Ты даровал мне власть И научил пророчеству событий. Ты - неба и земли Творец, Ты в этой жизни и в другой - мне Покровитель. Ты упокой меня предавшимся Тебе, Введи в число благочестивых

verses.text_uthmani: ذَٰلِكَ مِنْ أَنۢبَآءِ ٱلْغَيْبِ نُوحِيهِ إِلَيْكَ ۖ وَمَا كُنتَ لَدَيْهِمْ إِذْ أَجْمَعُوٓا۟ أَمْرَهُمْ وَهُمْ يَمْكُرُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ذ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>لِكَ مِنْ أَ<tajweed class='iqlb' data-type='iqlab' data-description='Iqlab' data-tajweed=':1910'>نۢب</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':1911'>ٱ</tajweed>لْغَيْبِ نُوحِيهِ إِلَيْكَ‌ۖ وَمَا كُ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':735'>نت</tajweed>َ لَدَيْهِمْ إِذْ أَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':6837'>جْ</tajweed>مَع<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ُوٓ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> أَمْرَهُمْ وَهُمْ يَمْكُر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Żālika min ambā'il-gaibi nūḥīhi ilaik(a), wa mā kunta ladaihim iż ajma'ū amrahum wa hum yamkurūn(a).
verses.translation: Сие - один из сказов про сокрытые (дела), Что Мы внушением тебе, (о Мухаммад!), ниспосылаем. Ты не был среди них в те времена, Когда они, сговариваясь, козни замышляли

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَآ أَكْثَرُ ٱلنَّاسِ وَلَوْ حَرَصْتَ بِمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَم<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَكْثَرُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6838'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed><tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َاسِ وَلَوْ حَرَصْتَ بِمُؤْمِن<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa mā akṡarun-nāsi wa lau ḥaraṣta bimu'minīn(a).
verses.translation: И все же большинство людей, Как ни желал бы ты (обратного тому), В неверии живут (и умирают)

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَا تَسْـَٔلُهُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ ۚ إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌ لِّلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَمَا تَسْــَٔلُهُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':6133'>جْ</tajweed>رٍ‌ۚ إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6839'>رٌ ل</tajweed>ِّلْعَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>لَم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa mā tas'aluhum 'alaihi min ajr(in), in huwa illā żikrul lil-'ālamīn(a).
verses.translation: У них за это платы ты не просишь, Сие - послание (Всевышнего) к мирам

verses.text_uthmani: وَكَأَيِّن مِّنْ ءَايَةٍ فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ يَمُرُّونَ عَلَيْهَا وَهُمْ عَنْهَا مُعْرِضُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَكَأَيّ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':2298'>ِن م</tajweed>ِّنْ ءَايَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':6840'>ةٍ ف</tajweed>ِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':609'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سَّمَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>و<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>تِ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':177'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَرْضِ يَمُرُّونَ عَلَيْهَا وَهُمْ عَنْهَا مُعْرِض<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa ka'ayyim min āyatin fis-samāwāti wal-arḍi yamurrūna 'alaihā wa hum 'anhā mu'rḍūn(a).
verses.translation: Какое множество знамений На небесах и на земле, Которые они проходят мимо И (более того) - воротят спины к ним

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَا يُؤْمِنُ أَكْثَرُهُم بِٱللَّهِ إِلَّا وَهُم مُّشْرِكُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَمَا يُؤْمِنُ أَكْثَرُه<tajweed class='ikhf_shfw' data-type='ikhafa-shafawi' data-description='Ikhafa' Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':6841'>ُم ب</tajweed>ِ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':32'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهِ إِلَّا وَه<tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':6842'>ُم م</tajweed>ُّشْرِك<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa mā yu'minu akṡaruhum billāhi illā wa hum musyrikūn(a).
verses.translation: И большинство из них Не верует в Аллаха без того, Чтоб соучастников Ему не прочить

verses.text_uthmani: أَفَأَمِنُوٓا۟ أَن تَأْتِيَهُمْ غَـٰشِيَةٌ مِّنْ عَذَابِ ٱللَّهِ أَوْ تَأْتِيَهُمُ ٱلسَّاعَةُ بَغْتَةً وَهُمْ لَا يَشْعُرُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أَفَأَمِن<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ُوٓ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> أَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':6843'>ن ت</tajweed>َأْتِيَهُمْ غَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>شِيَ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6844'>ةٌ م</tajweed>ِّنْ عَذَابِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6845'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهِ أَوْ تَأْتِيَهُمُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6846'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سَّاعَةُ بَغْتَ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':4880'>ةً و</tajweed>َهُمْ لَا يَشْعُر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Afa aminū an ta'tiyahum gāsyiyatum min 'ażābillāhi au ta'tiyahumus-sā'atu bagtataw wa hum lā yasy'urūn(a).
verses.translation: Ужель защищены они надежно от того, Что не падет на них Господня кара Иль не придет к ним Час Внезапно в тот момент, Когда они о нем не знают (и его не ждут)

verses.text_uthmani: قُلْ هَـٰذِهِۦ سَبِيلِىٓ أَدْعُوٓا۟ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ ۚ عَلَىٰ بَصِيرَةٍ أَنَا۠ وَمَنِ ٱتَّبَعَنِى ۖ وَسُبْحَـٰنَ ٱللَّهِ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قُلْ هَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>ذِه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed> سَبِيل<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِىٓ</tajweed> أَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':6847'>دْ</tajweed>ع<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ُوٓ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> إِلَى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':1637'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهِ‌ۚ عَلَىٰ بَصِيرَةٍ أَنَا۟ وَمَنِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6848'>ٱ</tajweed>تَّبَعَنِى‌ۖ وَسُ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':6849'>بْ</tajweed>حَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>نَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6850'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهِ وَم<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَنَا۟ مِنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':699'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُشْرِك<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qul hāżihī sabīlī ad'ū ilallāh(i), 'alā baṣīratin ana wa manittaba'anī, wa subḥānallāhi wa mā ana minal-musyrikīn(a).
verses.translation: Скажи: "Сие - моя стезя. Я вас зову к Аллаху И опираюсь на свидетельство, что зримо И мне, и тем, кто следует за мной. Хвала Аллаху, я - не с теми, Кто прочит соучастников Ему

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَآ أَرْسَلْنَا مِن قَبْلِكَ إِلَّا رِجَالًا نُّوحِىٓ إِلَيْهِم مِّنْ أَهْلِ ٱلْقُرَىٰٓ ۗ أَفَلَمْ يَسِيرُوا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ فَيَنظُرُوا۟ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَـٰقِبَةُ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ ۗ وَلَدَارُ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ خَيْرٌ لِّلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوْا۟ ۗ أَفَلَا تَعْقِلُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَم<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَرْسَلْنَا مِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':18'>ن ق</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':19'>بْ</tajweed>لِكَ إِلَّا رِجَال<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6851'>اً ن</tajweed>ُّوح<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِىٓ</tajweed> إِلَيْه<tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':3682'>ِم م</tajweed>ِّنْ أَهْلِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6852'>ٱ</tajweed>لْقُرَ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ىٰٓ‌ۗ</tajweed> أَفَلَمْ يَسِيرُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> فِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':44'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَرْضِ فَيَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':6853'>نظ</tajweed>ُرُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> كَيْفَ كَانَ عَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>قِبَةُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6854'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِينَ مِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':617'>ن ق</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':618'>بْ</tajweed>لِهِمْ‌ۗ وَلَدَارُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6855'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَخِرَةِ خَيْ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':4005'>رٌ ل</tajweed>ِّلَّذِينَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':1785'>ٱ</tajweed>تَّقَوْ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ‌ۗ</tajweed> أَفَلَا تَعْقِل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa mā arsalnā min qablika illā rijālan nūḥī ilaihim min ahlil-qurā, afalam yasīrū fil-arḍi fa yanẓurū kaifa kāna 'āqibatul-lażīna min qablihim, wa ladārul-ākhirati khairul lil-lażīnattaqau, afalā ta'qilūn(a).
verses.translation: И до тебя Мы никого не посылали, Помимо тех из жителей общин, Кому Мы Откровение внушали. Неужто по земле не ездили они, Не видели того, каков конец был тех, Которые до них (грешили)? Обитель будущего - краше Для тех, кто Господа страшится. Ужель им не понять того

verses.text_uthmani: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا ٱسْتَيْـَٔسَ ٱلرُّسُلُ وَظَنُّوٓا۟ أَنَّهُمْ قَدْ كُذِبُوا۟ جَآءَهُمْ نَصْرُنَا فَنُجِّىَ مَن نَّشَآءُ ۖ وَلَا يُرَدُّ بَأْسُنَا عَنِ ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: حَتَّ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ىٰٓ</tajweed> إِذَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6856'>ٱ</tajweed>سْتَيْــَٔسَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6857'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>رُّسُلُ وَظَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ُوٓ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> أَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُمْ قَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':298'>دْ</tajweed> كُذِبُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> ج<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءَهُمْ نَصْرُنَا فَنُجِّىَ م<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':4211'>َن ن</tajweed>َّش<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءُ‌ۖ وَلَا يُرَدُّ بَأْسُنَا عَنِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':4503'>ٱ</tajweed>لْقَوْمِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':4504'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':4093'>جْ</tajweed>رِم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Ḥattā iżastai'asar-rusulu wa ẓannū annahum qad kużibū jā'ahum naṣrunā, fa nujjiya man nasyā'(u), wa lā yuraddu ba'sunā 'anil-qaumil-mujrimīn(a).
verses.translation: Когда посланники теряли все надежды (В успехе миссии своей) И думали, что их сочли лжецами, К ним приходила Наша помощь, И были спасены лишь те, Кому (всеведеньем Своим) Мы пожелали (жизнь оставить), - Ведь Нашу мощь не отвратить От (наказанья) тем, кто во грехе

verses.text_uthmani: لَقَدْ كَانَ فِى قَصَصِهِمْ عِبْرَةٌ لِّأُو۟لِى ٱلْأَلْبَـٰبِ ۗ مَا كَانَ حَدِيثًا يُفْتَرَىٰ وَلَـٰكِن تَصْدِيقَ ٱلَّذِى بَيْنَ يَدَيْهِ وَتَفْصِيلَ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ وَهُدًى وَرَحْمَةً لِّقَوْمٍ يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: لَقَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':2389'>دْ</tajweed> كَانَ فِى قَصَصِهِمْ عِ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':6858'>بْ</tajweed>رَ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6859'>ةٌ ل</tajweed>ِّأُ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>وْ</tajweed>لِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':2496'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَلْبَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>بِ‌ۗ مَا كَانَ حَدِي<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':4536'>َىْءٍ و</tajweed>َهُ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':4537'>دًى و</tajweed>َرَحْمَ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':4735'>ةً ل</tajweed>ِّقَوْ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':4294'>مٍ ي</tajweed>ُؤْمِن<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Laqad kāna fī qaṣaṣihim 'ibratul li'ulil-albāb(i), mā kāna ḥadīṡay yuftarā wa lākin taṣdīqal-lażī baina yadaihi wa tafṣīla kulli syai'iw wa hudaw wa raḥmatal liqaumiy yu'minūn(a).
verses.translation: В повествовании о них Есть назидание для тех, Кто обладает разуменьем. Сей сказ не вымышлен, А (послан) в подтверждение того, Что до него ниспослано (другим) Как разъяснение всего, Как Руководство и как милость Для всех, кто Господу предался
